properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 1 at 8:51AM MST until January 2 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1-2 inches.

* WHERE...Grand Valley.

* WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Light snow on cold
untreated roadways will quickly accumulate through the morning.
Expect slick travel on all roads through New Years Day. A
detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT
